overview: The astronaut Debora floats into the outer space. After a turbulence, she reawakens in a familiar domestic environment that she can hardly recognize: all the objects that she finds have undergone a metamorphosis. Exploring this place, she meets two aliens, her Mother and her Grandmother. Telepathically, they tell her about their lives, sexuality and motherhood. Once their relationship is restored, astronaut Debora leaves to continue her journey.
title: Maris B653
